name: 2017_archive
title: Northern Ireland Assembly Election 2017
description:
From the Elections NI project, a database of the 5 March 2017 NI Assembly Elections,  including data on all of the candidates, constituencies, results (including stages and transfers) and outcomes. 

Contains data from the Electoral Commission Northern Ireland and the Northern Ireland Assembly (Open Government Licence).
Elections NI is a partnership between ODI Belfast and the NI Open Government Network not affiliated with the Electoral Commission or the NI Assembly.

rights.attributionText: Contains information from the Electoral Office for Northern Ireland under the Open Government Licence, and from Democracy Club, under CC-By-SA 4.0

author: Elections NI

resources.name: contest
resources.title: Contest
resources.description: Information on the election contest taking place, to provide comparability with other Assembly elections as well as working towards a common system for describing elections across the world.

fields.name: Contest_ID
fields.title: Contest
fields.description: A URI providing a unique identifier for the individual electoral contest

fields.name: Name
fields.description: A name for the election

fields.name: Election_Type
fields.title: Election Type
fields.description: The type of election. This should ideally draw from a controlled vocabulary

fields.name: Electoral_System
fields.title: Electoral System
fields.description: Identifies the electoral system being used in the election. Ideally this should draw from a controlled vocabulary

fields.name: Start_Date
fields.title: Start Date
fields.description: The date on which the electoral contest begun (i.e. voting day)

fields.name: End_Date
fields.title: End Date
fields.description: The date on which the electoral contest ended. Some contests run for a single day, in which case the start and end dates will be the same

resources.name: constituencies
resources.title: Constituencies
resources.description: Identifiers and voting information for all constituencies in election

fields.name: Constituency_Number
fields.description: {key} unique ID number given to each constituency, based on NI Assembly Open Data codes. See http://data.niassembly.gov.uk/members_json.ashx?m=GetAllConstituencies

fields.name: Constituency_Name
fields.description: Full (official) name

fields.name: ONS_Code
fields.description: Office of National Statistics identifying code for the analogous Westminster Parliamentary Constituency. See https://geoportal.statistics.gov.uk/geoportal/catalog/search/resource/details.page?uuid=%7B7E721144-C4DD-43A4-AEA3-BF94EB77A633%7D

fields.name: Constituency_Code
fields.description: Abbreviation of constituency name (generally 2-letter, but 3-letter in case of Newry & Armagh: NYA)

fields.name: Number_Of_Seats
fields.description: The number of seats available in the constituency

fields.name: Voting_Age_Pop
fields.description: Total population aged 18+ (n.b. some may not be entitled to vote due to residency status)

fields.name: Total_Poll
fields.description: Total number of votes cast

fields.name: Spoiled
fields.description: Total number of invalid votes

fields.name: Valid_Poll
fields.description: Total number of valid votes to be counted =(Total_Poll - Spoiled)

fields.name: Quota
fields.description: Pass mark for total number of votes to be elected in any stage

fields.name: Total_Electorate
fields.description: Total number of eligible voters on the electoral register

fields.name: Turnout_pct
fields.description: The turnout: Total_Poll as a percentage of Total_Electorate

fields.name: Directory
fields.description: Constituency name in the /constituency directory

resources.name: post-election-candidate-info
resources.title: Post-Election Candidate Information
resources.description: Information on those candidates including election outcomes, e.g. elected or excluded during the count, and the number of first preference votes received.

fields.name: Candidate_First_Pref_Votes
fields.description: Number of First Preference Votes received by each candidate. The same value for each candidate should be present in each Count_Number as this does not change

fields.name: Occurred_On_Count
fields.description: Count_Number that the candidate was elected on

fields.name: Gender
fields.description: Male/Female/Other

fields.name: Constituency_Name
fields.description: Name of the constituency in which the elected candidate stood

fields.name: Constituency_Number
fields.description: Identifier of the constituency in which the elected candidate stood

fields.name: Party_Name
fields.description: Political party title

fields.name: Directory
fields.title: Directory
fields.description: As with the NI/constituencies table

fields.name: Email
fields.description: Contact email address for the candidate

fields.name: Total_Votes
fields.description: The total number of votes amassed by the candidate at the final stage of the count

fields.name: Status
fields.description: If the candidate has been elected or excluded in this or any previous stage. (‘Elected’, ‘Excluded’ or null)

fields.name: Outgoing_Member
fields.description: If the member was an incumbent MLA at the end of the previous Assembly mandate (‘1’ true; ‘0’ false)

fields.name: Surname
fields.description: Elected candidate surname

fields.name: Firstname
fields.description: Elected candidate first name

fields.name: Twitter
fields.description: Elected candidate's twitter handle

fields.name: Candidate_Id
fields.description: {key} unique ID number given to each candidate

fields.name: Party_Id
fields.description: As with the NI/parties table

fields.name: Photo_URL
fields.description: URL for a profile photograph of the candidate

resources.name: full-candidates-list
resources.title: Full Candidates List
resources.description: Information describing each of the candidate competing in the contest

resources.name: parties
resources.title: Parties
resources.description: Information describing all political parties that have affiliated candidates in the contest (N.B. there is a ‘party’ for Independent candidates).

fields.name: Party_Id
fields.description: {key} unique ID number given to each party. Parties currently represented in the Assembly will be given the same Party_Id code as http://data.niassembly.gov.uk/organisations_json.ashx?m=GetPartiesListCurrent

fields.name: Party_Name
fields.description: Political party title

fields.name: Party_Abbreviation
fields.description: Short acronym for party

fields.name: Hex_Col
fields.description: 6-digit html color code

fields.name: Constituency_Name
fields.description: Full (official) name of the constituency the candidate is standing in

fields.name: Constituency_Number
fields.description: unique ID number given to each constituency, based on NI Assembly Open Data codes. See http://data.niassembly.gov.uk/members_json.ashx?m=GetAllConstituencies

fields.name: Candidate_Id
fields.description: {key} unique ID number given to each candidate

fields.name: Firstname
fields.description: Candidate’s first name

fields.name: Surname
fields.description: Candidate’s surname

fields.name: Outgoing_Member
fields.description: If the member was an incumbent MLA at the end of the previous Assembly mandate (‘1’ true; ‘0’ false)

fields.name: Party_Id
fields.description: unique ID number given to each party. Parties currently represented in the Assembly will be given the same Party_Id code as http://data.niassembly.gov.uk/organisations_json.ashx?m=GetPartiesListCurrent

fields.name: Party_Name
fields.description: Political party title

fields.name: Photo_URL
fields.description: Link to the candidate’s profile picture

fields.name: Directory
fields.description: Constituency name in the /constituency directory

fields.name: Gender
fields.description: Male/Female/Other

fields.name: Twitter
fields.description: Candidate's twitter handle

fields.name: Email
fields.description: Candidates contact email addresss

resources.name: constituencycount
resources.title: Constituency Count
resources.description: Headline data on polling in the constituency.

fields.name: Constituency_Number
fields.description: {key} As with the NI/constituencies table

fields.name: Total_Poll
fields.description: Total number of votes cast

fields.name: Spoiled
fields.description: Total number of invalid votes

fields.name: Valid_Poll
fields.description: Total number of valid votes to be counted =(Total_Poll - Spoiled)

fields.name: Quota
fields.description: Pass mark for total number of votes to be elected in any stage

fields.name: Total_Electorate
fields.description: Total number of eligible voters on the electoral register

fields.name: Number_Of_Seats
fields.description: Number of seats to be filled in constituency

fields.name: Constituency_Name
fields.description: Full (official) title

fields.name: Voting_Age_Pop
fields.description: Total population aged 18+ (n.b. some may not be entitled to vote due to residency status)

resources.name: count
resources.title: Count
resources.description: The results for each candidate and each count stage, representing the Single Transferable Vote system. Note that there is no {key} value (as the Candidate_Id will appear more than once), but that a number of keys from other tables are included. There is a row for each candidate at each count stage, even if they have already been excluded from the process.

fields.name: Constituency_Number
fields.description: As with the NI/constituences table

fields.name: Candidate_Id
fields.description: As with the Candidates table

fields.name: Count_Number
fields.description: Runs sequentially from 1 to the final count stage number for each candidate

fields.name: Firstname
fields.description: As with the Candidates table

fields.name: Surname
fields.description: As with the Candidates table

fields.name: Candidate_First_Pref_Votes
fields.description: Number of First Preference Votes received by each candidate. The same value for each candidate should be present in each Count_Number as this does not change

fields.name: Transfers
fields.description: The number of transfers received after the first stage (in Count_Number: 1 this will be 0). Can be negative when votes are transferred from a candidate due to exclusion or exceeding the quota

fields.name: Total_Votes
fields.description: The total number of votes that have been amassed by the candidate at the current count number =(Candidate_First_Pref_Votes + the sum of all Transfers at previous and current stages)

fields.name: Status
fields.description: If the candidate has been elected or excluded in this or any previous stage. (‘Elected’, ‘Excluded’ or null)

fields.name: Occurred_On_Count
fields.description: Count_Number that the change in status occured (even if it was on a previous count)

fields.name: Party_Name
fields.description: As with Candidates table

resources.name: nontransferable
resources.title: Nontransferable
resources.description: Number of non-transferred votes for each stage in the count.

fields.name: Constituency_Number
fields.description: As with Constituencies table

fields.name: Count_Number
fields.description: For each stage in the count (not including 1 as no votes to be transferred at this stage)

fields.name: Non_Transferable
fields.description: Number of votes not transferred to any candidate
